verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%>, that when <S%G3753><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had finished <S%G5055><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> sayings <S%G3056><s%>, he departed <S%G3332><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Galilee <S%G1056><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the coasts <S%G3725><s%> of Judaea <S%G2449><s%> beyond <S%G4008><s%> Jordan <S%G2446><s%>;
And <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> multitudes <S%G3793><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him <S%G846><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> he healed <S%G2323><s%> them <S%G846><s%> there <S%G1563><s%>.

The Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, tempting <S%G3985><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Is it lawful <S%G1487><s%> <S%G1832><s%> for a man <S%G444><s%> to put away <S%G630><s%> his <S%G846><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%> for <S%G2596><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> cause <S%G156><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> he answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Have ye <S%G314><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> read <S%G314><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> he which <S%G3588><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> them at <S%G575><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> them <S%G846><s%> male <S%G730><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> female <S%G2338><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, For this <S%G5127><s%> cause <S%G1752><s%> shall a man <S%G444><s%> leave <S%G2641><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall cleave <S%G4347><s%> to his <S%G846><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> they twain <S%G1417><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G1519><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%>?

Wherefore <S%G5620><s%> they are <S%G1526><s%> no more <S%G3765><s%> twain <S%G1417><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> one <S%G3391><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%>. What <S%G3739><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath joined together <S%G4801><s%>, let <S%G5563><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> man <S%G444><s%> put asunder <S%G5563><s%>.

They say <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Why <S%G5101><s%> did Moses <S%G3475><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> command <S%G1781><s%> to give <S%G1325><s%> a writing <S%G975><s%> of divorcement <S%G647><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to put <S%G630><s%> her <S%G846><s%> away <S%G630><s%>?

He saith <S%G3004><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> Moses <S%G3475><s%> because of <S%G4314><s%> the hardness <S%G4641><s%> of your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G4641><s%> suffered <S%G2010><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> to put away <S%G630><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> wives <S%G1135><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> it was <S%G1096><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> so <S%G3779><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, <S%G3754><s%> Whosoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall put away <S%G630><s%> his <S%G846><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%>, except <S%G1508><s%> it be for <S%G1909><s%> fornication <S%G4202><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall marry <S%G1060><s%> another <S%G243><s%>, committeth adultery <S%G3429><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> whoso marrieth <S%G1060><s%> her which <S%G3588><s%> is put away <S%G630><s%> doth commit adultery <S%G3429><s%>.

His <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> say <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, If <S%G1487><s%> the case <S%G156><s%> of the man <S%G444><s%> be <S%G2076><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> his wife <S%G1135><s%>, it is <S%G4851><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> good <S%G4851><s%> to marry <S%G1060><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, All <S%G3956><s%> men cannot <S%G3756><s%> receive <S%G5562><s%> this <S%G5126><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%>, save <S%G235><s%> they to whom <S%G3739><s%> it is given <S%G1325><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> there are <S%G1526><s%> some eunuchs <S%G2135><s%>, which <S%G3748><s%> were so <S%G3779><s%> born <S%G1080><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> their mother's <S%G3384><s%> womb <S%G2836><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> there are <S%G1526><s%> some eunuchs <S%G2135><s%>, which <S%G3748><s%> were made eunuchs <S%G2134><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> men <S%G444><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> there be <S%G1526><s%> eunuchs <S%G2135><s%>, which <S%G3748><s%> have made <S%G2134><s%> themselves <S%G1438><s%> eunuchs <S%G2134><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven's sake <S%G3772><s%>. He that is able <S%G1410><s%> to receive <S%G5562><s%> it, let him receive <S%G5562><s%> it.

Then <S%G5119><s%> were there brought <S%G4374><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%> little children <S%G3813><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> he should put <S%G2007><s%> his hands <S%G5495><s%> on <S%G2007><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> pray <S%G4336><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%> rebuked <S%G2008><s%> them <S%G846><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, Suffer <S%G863><s%> little children <S%G3813><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> forbid <S%G2967><s%> them <S%G846><s%> not <S%G3361><s%>, to come <S%G2064><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> of such <S%G5108><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> he laid <S%G2007><s%> his hands <S%G5495><s%> on <S%G2007><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and departed <S%G4198><s%> thence <S%G1564><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%>, behold <S%G2400><s%>, one <S%G1520><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Good <S%G18><s%> Master <S%G1320><s%>, what <S%G5101><s%> good thing <S%G18><s%> shall I do <S%G4160><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> I may have <S%G2192><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Why <S%G5101><s%> callest thou <S%G3004><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> good <S%G18><s%>? there is none <S%G3762><s%> good <S%G18><s%> but <S%G1508><s%> one <S%G1520><s%>, that is, God <S%G2316><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> thou wilt <S%G2309><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>, keep <S%G5083><s%> the commandments <S%G1785><s%>.

He saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Which <S%G4169><s%>? <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%>, Thou shalt do <S%G5407><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> murder <S%G5407><s%>, Thou shalt <S%G3431><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> commit adultery <S%G3431><s%>, Thou shalt <S%G2813><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> steal <S%G2813><s%>, Thou shalt <S%G5576><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> bear false witness <S%G5576><s%>,

Honour <S%G5091><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> father <S%G3962><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> thy mother <S%G3384><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%>, Thou shalt love <S%G25><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> neighbour <S%G4139><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> thyself <S%G4572><s%>.

The young man <S%G3495><s%> saith <S%G3004><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, All <S%G3956><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%> have I kept <S%G5442><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> youth up <S%G3503><s%>: what <S%G5101><s%> lack <S%G5302><s%> I yet <S%G2089><s%>?

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G5346><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, If <S%G1487><s%> thou wilt <S%G2309><s%> be <S%G1511><s%> perfect <S%G5046><s%>, go <S%G5217><s%> and sell <S%G4453><s%> that thou <S%G4675><s%> hast <S%G5224><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> to the poor <S%G4434><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thou shalt have <S%G2192><s%> treasure <S%G2344><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> come <S%G1204><s%> and follow <S%G190><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> when the young man <S%G3495><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that saying <S%G3056><s%>, he went away <S%G565><s%> sorrowful <S%G3076><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> he had <S%G2192><s%> <S%G2258><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> possessions <S%G2933><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> unto his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, That <S%G3754><s%> a rich man <S%G4145><s%> shall hardly <S%G1423><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, It is <S%G2076><s%> easier <S%G2123><s%> for a camel <S%G2574><s%> to go <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the eye <S%G5169><s%> of a needle <S%G4476><s%>, than <S%G2228><s%> for a rich man <S%G4145><s%> to enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

When <S%G1161><s%> his <S%G846><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it, they were exceedingly <S%G4970><s%> amazed <S%G1605><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%>, Who <S%G5101><s%> then <S%G686><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> be saved <S%G4982><s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> beheld <S%G1689><s%> them, and said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, With <S%G3844><s%> men <S%G444><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> impossible <S%G102><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> possible <S%G1415><s%>.

Then <S%G5119><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> unto him <S%G846><s%>, Behold <S%G2400><s%>, we <S%G2249><s%> have forsaken <S%G863><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%>; what <S%G5101><s%> shall we <S%G2254><s%> have <S%G2071><s%> therefore <S%G686><s%>?

And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>, Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, That <S%G3754><s%> ye <S%G5210><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> have followed <S%G190><s%> me <S%G3427><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> the regeneration <S%G3824><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> shall sit <S%G2523><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the throne <S%G2362><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%>, ye <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> shall sit <S%G2523><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> twelve <S%G1427><s%> thrones <S%G2362><s%>, judging <S%G2919><s%> the twelve <S%G1427><s%> tribes <S%G5443><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> one <S%G3739><s%> that hath forsaken <S%G863><s%> houses <S%G3614><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> sisters <S%G79><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> father <S%G3962><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> wife <S%G1135><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> children <S%G5043><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> lands <S%G68><s%>, for my <S%G3450><s%> name's <S%G3686><s%> sake <S%G1752><s%>, shall receive <S%G2983><s%> an hundredfold <S%G1542><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> shall inherit <S%G2816><s%> everlasting <S%G166><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>.
But <S%G1161><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> that are first <S%G4413><s%> shall be <S%G2071><s%> last <S%G2078><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%> shall be first <S%G4413><s%>.
